API Reference¶

This page details all public packages, subpackages, modules, classes and functions included in the VERONA library.

  • verona.data package
    • verona.data.download module
      • get_available_datasets()
      • get_dataset()
    • verona.data.extractor module
      • get_prefixes_and_targets()
    • verona.data.results module
      • AvailableMetrics
        • AvailableMetrics.ActivitySuffix
        • AvailableMetrics.NextActivity
        • AvailableMetrics.NextTimestamp
        • AvailableMetrics.RemainingTime
      • MetricValue
        • MetricValue.parent
        • MetricValue.value
      • MissingResultStrategy
        • MissingResultStrategy.DELETE_APPROACH
        • MissingResultStrategy.DELETE_DATASET
        • MissingResultStrategy.NONE
      • load_results_hierarchical()
      • load_results_non_hierarchical()
      • load_results_plackett_luce()
    • verona.data.split module
      • make_crossvalidation()
      • make_holdout()
      • make_temporal_split()
    • verona.data.statistics module
      • get_activities_list()
      • get_avg_duration_case()
      • get_avg_duration_event()
      • get_avg_len_case()
      • get_count_variants()
      • get_max_duration_case()
      • get_max_duration_event()
      • get_max_len_case()
      • get_min_duration_case()
      • get_min_duration_event()
      • get_min_len_case()
      • get_num_activities()
      • get_num_cases()
      • get_num_values()
      • get_num_variants()
      • get_values_list()
    • verona.data.utils module
      • DataFrameFields
        • DataFrameFields.ACTIVITY_COLUMN
        • DataFrameFields.CASE_COLUMN
        • DataFrameFields.RESOURCE_COLUMN

      • XesFields
        • XesFields.ACTIVITY_COLUMN
        • XesFields.CASE_COLUMN
        • XesFields.LIFECYCLE_COLUMN
        • XesFields.RESOURCE_COLUMN
        • XesFields.TIMESTAMP_COLUMN
      • categorize_attribute()
      • get_aggregation_representation()
      • get_labels_from_onehot()
      • get_onehot_representation()
      • read_eventlog()
      • sort_dataset()
      • sort_events()
      • unify_activity_and_lifecycle()
  • verona.evaluation package
    • verona.evaluation.metrics package
      • verona.evaluation.metrics.event module
        • get_accuracy()

        • get_fbeta()

        • get_precision()
        • get_recall()

        • get_mae()
        • get_mse()
      • verona.evaluation.metrics.utils module
        • get_metric_by_prefix_len()

      • verona.evaluation.stattests.correlated_t_test module
        • BayesianTTestResult
        • CorrelatedBayesianTTest

      • verona.evaluation.stattests.plackettluce module
        • PlackettLuceRanking
        • PlackettLuceResults
      • verona.evaluation.stattests.signed_rank module
        • BayesianSignedRankTest
